articles.author: Paul Sawers
articles.title: iPhone and Android users will soon be able to send encrypted RCS messages to each other - TechCrunch
articles.description: Text messages sent between iPhones and Android devices will soon benefit from end-to-end encryption (E2EE).
articles.content: Text messages sent between iPhones and Android devices will soon benefit from end-to-end encryption (E2EE), after the GSM Association (GSMA) yesterday published new specifications for the Rich Commun… [+2341 chars]
